title: LEAGUE OF LEGENDS ACHIEVEMENTS
body:
i think id would be great to have a achievement system in league of legends.
me and some friends think its a bit hard to get ip becuase we want to test champs out and stuff, so we dont have ip left over for runes.
its over all a bit hard to get ip because some of the times you onlu get like 80.
im thinking about achievements like having 5x{{item:3031}} with it saying wasnt one enough? or thinks like that.
and if you get an achievement you get a bit of ip. like for an easy one 100 ip and for a very hard one like unlocking all the champs 1000 ip.
it would be more fun, because you have something to play for. like some players get bored when they have everything, and with achievements they have something to play for.


by the way, add a replay system XD

replies.body: The problem is you'll have people just trying to farm achievements at the cost of the game.
`the thing is when people really need/want ip  they are going to farm achievements. maybe we can disable it on customs.
as long as you cannot get achievements in ranked I dont care people will try to get cheevo's instead of playing the game right.
